songs.title: I Learned from You
songs.lyrics:
[Intro: Miley Cyrus]
Ooh, yeah

[Verse 1: Miley Cyrus]
I didn't wanna listen to what you were saying
I thought that I knew all I need to know
I didn't realize that somewhere inside me
I knew you were right, but I couldn't say so

[Pre-Chorus 1: Miley Cyrus]
I can take care of myself, yeah
You taught me well

[Chorus: Miley Cyrus]
I learned from you that I do not crumble
I learned that strength is something you choose
All of the reasons to keep on believing
There's no question, that's a lesson that I learned from you

[Verse 2: Billy Ray Cyrus]
We always don't agree on what is the best way
To get to the place that we're going from here
But I can really trust you and give you the distance
To make your decisions without any fear

[Pre-Chorus 2: Billy Ray Cyrus & Miley Cyrus]
I'm grateful for all of the times
You opened my eyes

[Chorus: Miley Cyrus & Billy Ray Cyrus]
I learned from you that I do not crumble
I learned that strength is something you choose
All of the reasons to keep on believing
There's no question, that's a lesson that I learned from you

[Bridge: Miley Cyrus & Billy Ray Cyrus]
You taught me to stand on my own
And I thank you for that, it saved me, it made me
And now that I'm looking back
I can say, woah
Mmm-mmm, yeah!

[Chorus: Miley Cyrus & Billy Ray Cyrus]
I learned from you that I do not crumble
I learned that strength is something you choose
All of the reasons to keep on believing
There's no question, that's a lesson that I learned from you

[Chorus: Miley Cyrus & Billy Ray Cyrus]
I learned from you that I do not crumble
I learned that strength is something you choose
All of the reasons to keep on believing
There's no question, that's a lesson that I learned from you

[Outro: Miley Cyrus & Billy Ray Cyrus]
Yeah, yeah, I learned from you
